Entries.cc_Complete: It's lovely to have the old community centre back. We have so many memories from the old days... It's a special place.
Entries.married: I'm very happy for you, dear.$h#$e#Seeing young people in love is heart-warming for old grannies like me.
Entries.MovieInvitation: Oh my! That's so kind of you, dear. Why yes... I'd love to see a film!$h#$b#You go on ahead, and I'll meet you at the pictures.
Entries.Thu: I'll be baking biscuits today. I like to make flower shapes in the spring.$h#$e#Maybe I'll tell you my recipe one of these days.
Entries.Fri: George spends the whole day in front of that bloomin' television set.#$e#I wish he'd go outside more. Some fresh air would do him good.
Entries.summer_Thu: I'm going to bake biscuits today. They're coconut wonders shaped like little palm trees! Heehee.$h#$e#Maybe I'll tell you my recipe one of these days.
Entries.summer_Thu4: It seems like we always have more visitors when I start baking biscuits.#$e#My mother taught me the recipe.
Entries.fall_Thu: Today I'm baking biscuits. They're shaped like little pumpkins.$h#$e#Maybe I'll tell you my recipe one of these days.
Entries.winter_Thu: Today I'm baking biscuits. They're shaped like little winter stars.$h#$e#Maybe I'll tell you my recipe one of these days.
